tool.command: export PYTHONPATH=/home/kohvaeip/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages:/home/kohvaeip/.local/lib/:\$PYTHONPATH && cat "$inputs" >&2 && python "$vectorizer_script" '$inputs' ./outfile.txt && cat outfile.txt | tr -s ' ' '\t' | sed -e '1,3d' > $outfile

configfiles.configfile:
import sys import json import networkx import numpy as np from scipy.sparse import csr_matrix from scipy.io import mmwrite
from eden.graph import Vectorizer from eden.converter.graph.node_link_data import node_link_data_to_eden
input_json_path = sys.argv[1] outfile = sys.argv[2] params = json.load(open(input_json_path, "r"))
options = { k : v for k,v in params["options"].iteritems() if v}
graph_list = node_link_data_to_eden("$infile")
vectorizer = Vectorizer(**options)
sparse_representation = vectorizer.transform(graph_list) mmwrite(open(outfile , 'w+'), sparse_representation)
